verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> when they had passed through <S%G1353><s%> Amphipolis <S%G295><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Apollonia, <S%G624><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Thessalonica, <S%G2332><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> a Jewish <S%G2453><s%> synagogue. <S%G4864><s%>

Paul, <S%G3972><s%> as <S%G2596><s%> was <S%G1486><s%> his custom, <S%G1486><s%> went in <S%G1525><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> Sabbath days <S%G4521><s%> reasoned <S%G1256><s%> with them <S%G846><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the Scriptures, <S%G1124><s%>

explaining <S%G1272><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> demonstrating <S%G3908><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the Christ <S%G5547><s%> had <S%G1163><s%> to suffer <S%G3958><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> rise again <S%G450><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saying, <S%G3754><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> proclaim <S%G2605><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Christ. <S%G5547><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> were persuaded, <S%G3982><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> joined <S%G4345><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Silas, <S%G4609><s%> of <S%G5037><s%> the devout <S%G4576><s%> Greeks <S%G1672><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude, <S%G4128><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a few <S%G3641><s%> of the chief <S%G4413><s%> women. <S%G1135><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> unpersuaded <S%G544><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> <S%G99999><s%> took along <S%G4355><s%> <S%G2532><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> wicked <S%G4190><s%> men <S%G435><s%> from the marketplace, <S%G60><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gathering a <S%G2532><s%> crowd, <S%G3792><s%> set the <S%G2350><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> in an uproar. <S%G2350><s%> Assaulting <S%G2186><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> of Jason, <S%G2394><s%> they sought <S%G2212><s%> to bring <S%G71><s%> them <S%G846><s%> out <S%G71><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the people. <S%G1218><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> they didn't <S%G3361><s%> find <S%G2147><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> they dragged <S%G4951><s%> Jason <S%G2394><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> the rulers of the city, <S%G4173><s%> crying, <S%G994><s%> "These <S%G3778><s%> who <S%G3754><s%> have turned <S%G387><s%> the world <S%G3625><s%> upside down <S%G387><s%> have come <S%G3918><s%> here <S%G1759><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%>

whom <S%G3739><s%> Jason <S%G2394><s%> has received. <S%G5264><s%> <S%G2532><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> act <S%G4238><s%> contrary <S%G561><s%> to the decrees <S%G1378><s%> of Caesar, <S%G2541><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> that there is <S%G1511><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> king, <S%G935><s%> Jesus! <S%G2424><s%>"
The <S%G1161><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> the rulers of the city <S%G4173><s%> were troubled <S%G5015><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> these things. <S%G5023><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> they had taken <S%G2983><s%> security <S%G2425><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> Jason <S%G2394><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the rest, <S%G3062><s%> they let <S%G630><s%> them <S%G846><s%> go. <S%G630><s%>

The <S%G1161><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> sent <S%G5037><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> Silas <S%G4609><s%> away <S%G1599><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Beroea. <S%G960><s%> When they <S%G3748><s%> arrived, <S%G3854><s%> they went <S%G549><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the Jewish <S%G2453><s%> synagogue. <S%G4864><s%>

Now these <S%G3778><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> more noble <S%G2104><s%> than those <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Thessalonica, <S%G2332><s%> in that <S%G3748><s%> they received <S%G1209><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> readiness of the mind, <S%G4288><s%> examining <S%G350><s%> the Scriptures <S%G1124><s%> <S%G2596><s%> daily <S%G2250><s%> to see whether <S%G1487><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> were <S%G2192><s%> so. <S%G3779><s%>

Many <S%G4183><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G99999><s%> believed; <S%G4100><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the prominent <S%G2158><s%> Greek <S%G1674><s%> women, <S%G1135><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a few <S%G3641><s%> men. <S%G435><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> of <S%G575><s%> Thessalonica <S%G2332><s%> had knowledge <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> was proclaimed <S%G2605><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Beroea <S%G960><s%> also, <S%G2546><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> there likewise, <S%G2532><s%> agitating <S%G4531><s%> the multitudes. <S%G3793><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> the brothers <S%G80><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> sent out <S%G1821><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> to go <S%G4198><s%> as far as <S%G5613><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G99999><s%> Silas <S%G4609><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> still <S%G5278><s%> stayed <S%G5278><s%> there. <S%G1563><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who escorted <S%G2525><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> brought <S%G71><s%> him <S%G846><s%> as far as <S%G2193><s%> Athens. <S%G116><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Receiving <S%G2983><s%> a commandment <S%G1785><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Silas <S%G4609><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> that they should <S%G2443><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> very <S%G5613><s%> quickly, <S%G5033><s%> they departed. <S%G1826><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> while Paul <S%G3972><s%> waited <S%G1551><s%> for them <S%G846><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Athens, <S%G116><s%> his <S%G846><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> was provoked <S%G3947><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> as <S%G5607><s%> he saw <S%G2334><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> full of idols. <S%G2712><s%>

So <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3767><s%> he <S%G1256><s%> reasoned in <S%G1722><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> with the Jews <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the devout persons, <S%G4576><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the marketplace <S%G58><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> met him. <S%G3909><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> of the Epicurean <S%G1946><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Stoic <S%G4770><s%> philosophers <S%G5386><s%> also were conversing <S%G4820><s%> with him. <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> <S%G99999><s%> does <S%G2309><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> babbler <S%G4691><s%> want to say? <S%G1161><s%>" Others <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G1380><s%> "He seems to be <S%G1511><s%> advocating <S%G2604><s%> foreign <S%G3581><s%> deities, <S%G1140><s%>" because <S%G3754><s%> he preached <S%G2097><s%> <S%G846><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the resurrection. <S%G386><s%>

They <S%G5037><s%> took <S%G1949><s%> hold of him, <S%G846><s%> and brought <S%G71><s%> him to <S%G1909><s%> the Areopagus, <S%G697><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "May <S%G1410><s%> we know <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> teaching <S%G1322><s%> is, <S%G5259><s%> which is spoken <S%G2980><s%> by you? <S%G4675><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> you bring <S%G1533><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> strange <S%G3579><s%> things to <S%G1519><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> ears. <S%G189><s%> We want to <S%G1519><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> mean. <S%G1511><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the Athenians <S%G117><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the strangers <S%G3581><s%> living <S%G3588><s%> there <S%G1927><s%> spent their time <S%G2119><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> else, <S%G2087><s%> but either <S%G2228><s%> to tell <S%G3004><s%> or <S%G2532><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> new thing. <S%G2537><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the middle <S%G3319><s%> of the Areopagus, <S%G697><s%> and said, <S%G5346><s%> "You men <S%G435><s%> of Athens, <S%G117><s%> I perceive <S%G2334><s%> that you <S%G5209><s%> are <S%G5613><s%> very religious <S%G1174><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> all things. <S%G3956><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> as I passed along, <S%G1330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> observed <S%G333><s%> the objects of your <S%G5216><s%> worship, <S%G4574><s%> I found <S%G2147><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> an altar <S%G1041><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G3739><s%> inscription: <S%G1924><s%> <S%G57><s%> 'TO AN UNKNOWN GOD. <S%G2316><s%>' What <S%G3739><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> you worship <S%G2151><s%> in ignorance, <S%G50><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> announce <S%G2605><s%> to you. <S%G5213><s%>

The God <S%G2316><s%> who made <S%G4160><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> he, <S%G3778><s%> being <S%G5225><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> earth, <S%G1093><s%> doesn't <S%G3756><s%> dwell <S%G2730><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> temples <S%G3485><s%> made with hands, <S%G5499><s%>

neither <S%G3761><s%> is he served <S%G2323><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> men <S%G444><s%>'s hands, <S%G5495><s%> as though he needed <S%G4326><s%> anything, <S%G5100><s%> seeing he <S%G846><s%> himself gives <S%G1325><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> breath, <S%G4157><s%> and <S%G2596><s%> all things. <S%G3956><s%>

He <S%G5037><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> from one <S%G1520><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> men <S%G444><s%> to dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the surface <S%G4383><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> having determined <S%G3724><s%> appointed <S%G4384><s%> seasons, <S%G2540><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the boundaries <S%G3734><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> dwellings, <S%G2733><s%>

that they should seek <S%G2212><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> <S%G686><s%> perhaps <S%G1065><s%> they might reach out for <S%G5584><s%> him <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> find <S%G2147><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> though <S%G2544><s%> he is <S%G5225><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> far <S%G3112><s%> from <S%G575><s%> each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of us. <S%G2257><s%>

<S%G1063><s%> 'For in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> we live, <S%G2198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> move, <S%G2795><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have our being. <S%G2070><s%>' As <S%G5613><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G2596><s%> your own <S%G5209><s%> poets <S%G4163><s%> have said, <S%G2046><s%> <S%G1063><s%> 'For we are <S%G2070><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> his offspring. <S%G1085><s%>'

Being <S%G5225><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> the offspring <S%G1085><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> we ought <S%G3784><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to think that <S%G3543><s%> the Divine Nature <S%G2304><s%> is <S%G1511><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> gold, <S%G5557><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> silver, <S%G696><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> stone, <S%G3037><s%> engraved <S%G5480><s%> by art <S%G5078><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> design <S%G1761><s%> of man. <S%G444><s%>

<S%G3303><s%> The times <S%G5550><s%> of ignorance <S%G52><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> overlooked. <S%G5237><s%> But <S%G3588><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> he commands <S%G3853><s%> that all <S%G3956><s%> people <S%G444><s%> everywhere <S%G3837><s%> should repent, <S%G3340><s%>

because <S%G1360><s%> he has appointed <S%G2476><s%> a day <S%G2250><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he will <S%G3195><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> the world <S%G3625><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the man <S%G435><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he has ordained; <S%G3724><s%> of which he has given <S%G3930><s%> assurance <S%G4102><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men, <S%G450><s%> in that he has raised him <S%G846><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead. <S%G3498><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> of the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of the dead, <S%G3498><s%> some <S%G3588><s%> mocked; <S%G5512><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> others <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "We want to hear <S%G191><s%> you <S%G4675><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> <S%G99999><s%> this. <S%G5127><s%>"
Thus <S%G3779><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> among <S%G3319><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> men <S%G435><s%> joined <S%G2853><s%> with him, <S%G846><s%> and believed, <S%G4100><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> whom also <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G2532><s%> Dionysius <S%G1354><s%> the Areopagite, <S%G698><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Damaris, <S%G1152><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> others <S%G2087><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>
